graphTweets 0.4.1

Nodes

Source: R/overhaul.R

Get nodes from a graphTweets object.

gt_nodes(gt, meta = FALSE)

Arguments

gt

An object of class graphTweets as returned by gt_edges.
meta

Set to TRUE to add meta data to nodes.

Value

An object of class graphTweets, adds nodes.

Examples

# simulate dataset
tweets <- data.frame(
  text = c("I tweet @you about @him",
           "I tweet @me about @you"),
  screen_name = c("me", "him"),
  retweet_count = c(19, 5),
  status_id = c(1, 2),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

tweets %>%
  gt_edges(text, screen_name, status_id) %>%
  gt_nodes() -> net
